Arpon Raksit — Math, Writing

Math

My mathematical interests are centered around homotopy theory. Slightly more information about me can be gleaned from my résumé.

Formal writing

  • Characters in global equivariant homotopy theory
    23 Mar 2015 — My undergraduate thesis, on the generalized character theory of Hopkins-Kuhn-Ravenel and Stapleton.

Informal notes

  • Vector fields and the J-homomorphism
    09 May 2014 — On Adams's work on counting vector fields on spheres and the J-homomorphism.
  • Defining the cotangent complex
    17 Dec 2013 — On Quillen's application of the theory of model categories to defining a homology theory for algebras.
  • The Dold-Kan correspondence
    26 Oct 2013 — A proof of the titular result, and a couple of quick consequences.
